name: Veres
description: The enigmatic and powerful goddess of death, who holds the secrets of life and the afterlife.

dialogue: These shrooms become a bit 'magical' if you are in the right mind space. Thanks, now all I need is some company.
Ugh, turf over surf. But fine, I'll try frying it.
A rare and delightful spirit; where'd you find it? Lovely!
I think I still hate fish.
Don't worry. I am supposed to be the 'Final Boss' of the game.
Who are you, the game developer!?
As expected. Still the final boss here babe.
You finally cracked the secret, right? ;)

intro_dialogue: This place is crawling with these young dragon hatchlings. Figure out how to beat them, and defeat 5 of them.
Another mortal seeking favor. If you wish to prove your worth, there is a Woodmech Bear causing a nuisance. Remove it.
reminder_dialogue: The bear still draws breath. My interest wanes.
Report back to me when the mechanical beast is scrap metal.
success_dialogue: You have a spark. I am... intrigued. This is a small token for your service.

intro_dialogue: Your strength is adequate, but strength alone is meaningless. I require a Magma Fossil. It is said they can be found in the mountains.
reminder_dialogue: The mountains are that way. Are you lost?
My patience is not infinite. Bring me the fossil.
success_dialogue: Good. You are not entirely useless. Perhaps you will be a useful tool after all.

intro_dialogue: This realm is... tedious. Your presence provides a minor diversion. Amuse me.
You again. What do you want? Conversation? How droll.
reminder_dialogue: I am still waiting to be amused.
Your attempts to curry favor are noted. And found wanting.
success_dialogue: Hm. You are more interesting than the usual rabble. I suppose I can tolerate your presence.

intro_dialogue: They say the 'Queen of Hell' has no heart. An amusing, if inaccurate, sentiment. What do you think, mortal?
reminder_dialogue: Have you pondered my question? Or is your mind as empty as your hands?
success_dialogue: A surprisingly nuanced answer. You may last longer than the others.
